review: Love this. Took my television entertainment from complete boredom to something i look forward to. It also made my the day for an elderly relative while I streamed Frank Sinatra all day from Pandora
author: Andrew Baranello

review: This was a Christmas gift for my son-in-law.  He was surprised and loved it.  My son also has one, and it has always worked just as expected.
author: Narayne Rougeau

review: This is a great.  I love it so much that I've given it as a gift several times and the recipients always enjoy it.
author: M. Colon

review: I love this product, it has been working great with my iPhone and laptop.
author: Phong Q. Tran "tranpq"

review: I love this thing. I use this over my PlayStation to watch Netflix and Google Play movies.
author: Wade Wilson

review: Got it for my boyfriend and he loves it! Can stream anything from your phone to your TV! I need to get one for myself too.
author: rabia hasani
